queries.name: Churn - Total MRR - Universal (14)
queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders);

queries.name: Churn - Subscriptions based on Internet Service - Universal (15)
queries.query:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_app_events inner join hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_users using (user_id) where platform is not null
group by platform, churn

queries.name: Churn - Customer Breakdown - Universal
queries.query:
SELECT canal, count(*) as users_count
	FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_features  WHERE churn =1  and canal is not null GROUP BY canal

queries.name: Churn - Predictions - Universal
queries.query:
SELECT cast(days_since_creation/30 as int) as days_since_creation, churn, count(*) as customers
   FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_features
   GROUP BY days_since_creation, churn having days_since_creation < 1000

queries.name: Churn - Monthly Revenue Risk - Universal
queries.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR_at_risk FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders) and user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1);

queries.name: Churn - At-Risk Customers - Universal
queries.query: SELECT count(*)/12 as at_risk FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_users WHERE churn=1

queries.name: Churn - Predicted Churn Percent Payment Method - Universal
queries.query:
-- select * from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_features;

SELECT p.country, p.churn, count(*) as customers
	FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_features p
	GROUP BY p.country, p.churn

queries.name: Churn - Predicted to Churn - Universal
queries.query: SELECT user_id, churn from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_users where churn=1

query.name: Churn - Total MRR - Universal (14)
query.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR FROM hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(transaction_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from hive_metastore.dbdemos_c360.churn_orders);
